Package org.drip.service.sample

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BloombergCDSW
    Demo of reproduction of the calculations in Bloomberg's CDSW screen
    BondAnalyticsAPI
    Demo of the bond analytics API Sample
    BondBasketAPI
    Demo of the bond basket API Sample
    BondLiveAndEODAPI
    Comprehensive sample class demo'ing the usage of the EOD and Live Curve FI API functions
    BondSample
    Simple Bond Sample demonstrating the construction and usage of bond functionality
    BondStaticAPI
    Demo of the bond static API Sample
    CDSBasketAPI
    Demo of the CDS basket API Sample

    Comprehensive sample class demo'ing the usage of the EOD and Live CDS Curve API functions

    Demo of the FX API Sample
    RatesAnalyticsAPI
    Demo of the Rates Analytics API Sample
    RatesLiveAndEODAPI

    TreasuryCurve
    Demo of construction and usage of the treasury discount curve from government bond inputs
